# Unique Iteration

* [Documentation](https://uniquer.readthedocs.io/en/stable/)
* [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/uniquer/)
* [Sources](https://github.com/nbiotcloud/uniquer)

## Installation

Installing it is pretty easy:

```bash
pip install uniquer
```
